alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 25 at 9:25PM EDT until March 25 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR SHELBY AND NORTHEASTERN JOHNSON COUNTIES... At 924 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Greenwood, or 10 miles northwest of Shelbyville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Fairland around 930 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Shelbyville, Waldron and St. Paul. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 90 and 96. Interstate 74 between mile markers 102 and 123. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
